STACK MORE, SAVE MORE - Up to 25% Off Sactionals & Stealthtech

Stack More, Save More

Up to 25% off Sactionals & StealthTech

  • Get 15% off Sactionals Inserts, Covers, and Power Hubs on a single transaction that includes 6-10 Sactionals Seats, Sides, StealthTech Center Channel, StealthTech Subwoofer, StealthTech L-Side, Stealth Tech R-Side, StealthTech Satellite side and Power Hubs.
  • Get 20% off Sactionals Inserts, Covers, and Power Hubs on a single transaction that includes 11-15  Sactionals Seat, Sides, StealthTech Center Channel, StealthTech Subwoofer, StealthTech L-Side, StealthTech R-Side, StealthTech Satellite side and Power Hubs.
  • Get 25% off Sactionals Inserts, Covers, and Power Hubs on a single transaction that includes 16 or more  Sactionals Seat, Sides, StealthTech Center Channel, StealthTech Subwoofer, StealthTech L-Side, StealthTech R-Side, StealthTech Satellite side and Power Hubs.

Qualifying quantity is the total number of Sactionals Seat Inserts, Side Inserts, Angled Side Inserts, StealthTech Center Channel, StealthTech Subwoofer, StealthTech L-Side, StealthTech R-Side, StealthTech Satellite side and Power Hubs present in cart. Discount applies to Sactionals Covers, Sactionals Inserts, Angled Side Inserts, StealthTech Center Channel, StealthTech Subwoofer, StealthTech L-Side, StealthTech R-Side, StealthTech Satellite side and Power Hubs. Valid on purchases of Inserts with Covers or Inserts only, not valid on purchases of Covers without Inserts. Offer cannot be applied to previous purchases. Excludes Books, Clearance Items, Floor Model, The Secret Ingredients Hardware Kit, Sactionals Shoes, Sactionals Feet, and Shrink Kits. Returns: If the return of one (or more) Seat and/or Side StealthTech Center Channel, StealthTech Subwoofer, StealthTech L-Side, StealthTech R-Side, StealthTech Satellite side causes the transaction’s minimum required Sactionals pieces to fall below the amount required to be eligible for the applied discount, the discount will be adjusted, and refund prorated. Offer can be combined with extended financing through Lovesac Credit Card Offer  Lovesac Credit Card, Heroes 5% Discount Program, and Refer A Friend. Heroes and Student discounts cannot be used in the same transaction. Offer is not combinable with any other promotions. Applies to US orders only. Additional Terms and Conditions apply.

PAY IT YOUR WAY – 36 Months Promotional Financing on purchases with your Lovesac credit card 9/9 - 9/16/24†

Promotional Financing

No Interest for 36 Months†

On purchases made with your Lovesac credit card from 9/9 - 9/16/24. Equal monthly payments required for 36 months. Promo fee of 2% of amount financed will be included in required monthly payments.

† Offer available online 12 AM PST on 9/9/2024 through 11:59 PM PST on 9/16/2024 and in all Lovesac showrooms 9/9 - 9/16/2024. A promo fee, equal to 2% of the amount financed at time of purchase, will be shown as a separate transaction on your billing statement and included in the balance subject to this promo. Any taxes, delivery or other charges included in the amount financed will increase the related promo fee and the required monthly payments. For example, a $950 purchase with $50 in taxes and shipping costs, will be charged a promo fee equal to $20 and $1,020 will be charged to your account. No interest will be charged on the amount financed (including related promo fee) and equal monthly payments are required on such balance until it is paid in full. The payments equal the amount financed (including related promo fee) divided by the number of months in the promo period, rounded up to the next cent. These payments may be higher than the payments that would be required if this purchase was a non-promo purchase. During the last month(s) of the promo period the required monthly payment may be reduced due to the prior months’ rounding. Regular account terms apply to non-promo purchases. New Accounts as of 7/16/2024: Purchase APR 34.99%. Penalty APR 39.99%. Min Interest Charge $2. Existing cardholders: See your credit card agreement terms. Subject to credit approval.

Seat + Side Options

Seat Types

All Seat include a Seat Frame, Cushion, and Back Pillow.

GET STARTED

  1. Standard Storage Seat Insert

    $575

    • Give yourself extra space for toys, books, and more.
    • Can be set wide or deep for possibilities.
    • 35" Wide x 29" Deep.

  2. Deep Storage Seat Insert

    $575

    • Like a Standard Storage Seat, but with a Deep Back Pillow to align with the narrow side of the Seat.
    • 29" Wide x 35" Deep.

  3. Standard Seat Insert

    $450

    • Arrange any number to create your layout.
    • An extra 6' of width for more room to spread out and relax.
    • 35" Wide x 29" Deep.

  4. Deep Seat Insert

    $450

    • Just like a Standard Seat but with a Deep Back Pillow.
    • An extra 6' of depth - great for lounging or taller people.
    • 29" Wide x 35" Deep.

  5. Wedge Seat Insert

    $450

    • Create a curvier, cozier configuration.
    • Maximize the user of the corner in your setup.
    • 1 Wedge Seat turns your couch 45".

Side Styles

From modern to classic, create a style all your own.

GET STARTED

  1. Standard Side Insert

    $225

    • As an arm, clean lines provide a class look.
    • As a back, it gives a more supportive sitting position.
    • 35" Wide x 28.5" Tall.

  2. Deep Side Insert

    $225

    • Lines up to the shorter side of a Seat Frame.
    • Needed when using 3 or more Deep Seats in a row.
    • 29" Wide x 28.5" Tall.

  3. Roll Arm Side Insert

    $225

    • Curved edges provide a more traditional style.
    • Can be used as an arm only.
    • 35" Wide x 26" Tall.

  4. Angled Side Insert

    $225

    • As an arm, defined edges create a contemporary style.
    • As a back, a slight recline provides a deeper sense of comfort.
    • 35" Wide x 28.5" Tall.

  5. Deep Angled Side Insert

    $225

    • Lines up to the shorter side of a Seat Frame.
    • Needed when using 3 or more Deep Seats in a row.
    • 29" Wide x 28.5" Tall.

Customize Your Comfort

2 Fill Options

Standard Foam

+$0 per Seat

  • Seat Cushion - 3 high-density layers, including a supportive central layer for a firmer feel.

  • Back Pillow - 3 horizontal chambers of non-woven ticking (a linen textile that is tightly woven for durability).

Lovesoft

+$200  per seat

  • Seat Cushion - A luxurious, proprietary blend of synthetic fiber sitting atop a foam-filled bottom chamber creating our softest sit.

  • Back Pillow - 3 horizontal chambers of Lovesoft synthetic fibers.

Add-On and Accessorize

Enhance your setup for evven more ways to enjoy Total Comfort.

GET STARTED

  1. Sactionals Power Hub

    $200

    • Fits into any Sactionals Side.
    • Provides power where you need it most.
    • One USB-C, two USB-A charging ports, and one 120V AC outlet 12' cord.
    • A convenience outlet on the cord for more power options.

  2. Coaster

    $45

    • Convenient, reachable drink holder for Standard Sides.
    • 3.5" diameter with felt coaster.
    • Made of solid bent wood.
    • Available in 3 finishes.
    • 7.5" Wide x 5" Tall x 6" Deep.

  3. Angled Side Coaster

    $55

    • Convenient, reachable drink holder for Angled Sides.
    • 3.5" diameter with felt coaster.
    • Made of solid bent wood.
    • Available in 2 finishes.
    • 6" Wide x 4.4" Tall x 5.6" Deep.

  4. Table

    $165

    • Table for Sactionals Seats.
    • Made of solid bent wood.
    • Available in 3 finishes.
    • 31" Long x 15.5" Wide x 8" Tall.

  5. Drink Holder

    $55

    • Convenient, reachable drink holder for Standard Sides.
    • Hole is 3.5" wide, 2" deep, with felt coaster.
    • Keeps drink from spillling.
    • Made of solid bent wood.
    • Available in 3 finishes.
    • 7.5" Wide x 6.5" Tall x 6" Deep.

  6. Angled Side Drink Holder

    $65

    • Convenient, reachable drink holder for Angled Sides.
    • Hole is 3.5" wide, 2" deep with felt coaster.
    • Side cutout for mugs.
    • Made of solid bent hardwood.
    • Available in 2 finishes.
    • 6" Wide x 5.8" Tall x 6" Deep.

  7. Roll Arm Drink Holder

    $85

    • Convenient, reachable drink holder for Roll Arms.
    • Hole is 3.5" wide, 1.25" deep, with felt coaster.
    • Keeps drink from spilling.
    • Made of solid bent wood.
    • Available in 3 finishes.
    • 9.5" Wide x 5.5" Tall x 6" Deep.

Ships Free

Try it in your home risk free for 60 days.

SHOP NOW

As seen in Architectural Digest

"Angled Sides deliver enhanced style and comfort." - Drew Scott, Lone Fox

Add StealthTech® Sound + Charge

• Immersive, Harman Kardon surround sound.
• Speakers and subwoofer embedded
   inside Sactionals.
• Integrated wireless charging.
• Reverse compatible and totally tool-free.

    LEARN MORE

    SHOP NOW

    FIND A SHOWROOM

    Designed For Life™

    At Lovesac, we believe we can inspire people to buy less stuff by creating products that last longer. Products that can adapt, evolve, and grow with us, and that are designed with forever in mind.

    This is true sustainability.

    100+ Million Plastic Bottles Saved

    The base fabric of Sac and Sactionals Inserts is made using recycled plastic bottles.

    20+ Million Pounds of Foam Recycled Yearly

    We use reclaimed foam remnants called Durafoam to give Sacs their Signature sit.

    60-Day Home Trial

    Total Comfort or your money back

    Guaranteed for Life

    All Sactionals hard pieces come with a lifetime warranty.
